i1.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pyke's''' {{sti|health|{{as|'''maximum''' health}}}} cannot increase except through [[Growth#Increasing_Statistics|growth (per level)]], instead he gains{{ft|{{sti|{{as|1 '''bonus''' attack damage}}}} {{as|per 14 '''bonus''' health}}.|{{as|({{fd|7.143}}% '''bonus''' health)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.}}

'''Pyke''' also stores {{passive progression/deprecated version|key=%|25 to 50}} of the damage he takes from enemy champions as ''Grey Health'' on his {{as|health bar}}, up to 80 {{as|(+ 800% '''bonus''' AD)}}, with an upper cap of {{as|60% of his '''maximum''' health}}.
When '''Pyke''' is unseen by enemies, he rapidly consumes his ''Grey Health'' to {{tip|heal}} for the same amount.
{{sbc|Hidden innate:}} '''Pyke''' gains {{as|1 '''bonus''' movement speed}} while in the river.
i1.notes:
* Game elements that increase health based on the champion's health (e.g {{ii|Cinderhulk}}, {{iis|Gargoyle Stoneplate}}, {{ri|Overgrowth}}) will increase the health before getting converted by ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'', thus granting increased {{as|bonus AD}}.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} and {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} take effect after ''Gift of the Drowned Ones's'' healing cap.
*'''Pyke's''' ''Grey Health'' does not have a time limit, and will stay on his {{as|health bar}} until '''Pyke''' leaves enemy vision or dies.
* Since '''Pyke's''' '''maximum''' health cannot be increased, ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'' reaches the upper cap of {{as|60% of '''maximum''' health}} at {{passive progression/deprecated version|(0.6*({{ccd|Pyke|hp_base}}+{{ccd|Pyke|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))-80)/8|color=ad}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
* Amount of attack damage granted from list of items that grants health, converted with ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'':
{{Item stat table|pykehealth}}

q1.name: Bone Skewer
q1.target_range: {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{passive progression/deprecated version|type=channel time|8|400;400 to 1100|0;0.4 to 1|displayformula=400+(116.67 per 0.1 seconds, starting at 0.4 seconds). ''This is capped at 1 second.''}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to 3 seconds, increasing ''Bone Skewer's'' range while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20%. ''Bone Skewer'' can be recast at any time within its duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Pyke''' {{tip|projectile|hurls}} his harpoon in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy struck, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them {{tt|towards his direction|The pull can fling an enemy behind Pyke if the harpoon hits at close range}}, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 90% for 1 second, and briefly {{tip|sight|revealing}} them.

Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.4}} seconds causes '''Pyke''' to instead thrust his blade in the target direction, dealing  the same damage to the closest enemy {{tip|champion}}, or closest enemy if no champion is hit.

If '''Pyke''' is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Bone Skewer'' is cancelled and the ability is put on full {{sti|cooldown}} but refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|half the mana cost}}}}.
q1.notes:
* Only the charged version of ''Bone Skewer'' will be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* {{si|Flash}} can be used during the cast time and ''Bone Skewer'' will affect enemies at the new location.
* '''Pyke''' can still use [[summoner spell]]s besides {{si|Flash}}, {{si|Teleport}}, {{si|Hexflash}}, and {{si|Mark}} / {{si|Dash}} while hurling the harpoon but he cannot perform any other action.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pyke''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|cast=interrupts|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can use trinkets}}

w1.name: Ghostwater Dive
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' submerges into water, entering {{tip|camouflage}} for 5 seconds and gaining {{as|40%|ms}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% per 1 Lethality)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over the duration. Enemies are notified if '''Pyke''' is within 1500 units of them.
Attacking or casting abilities immediately ends ''Ghostwater Dive''.
w1.notes:
* When '''Pyke''' is hidden nearby in his ''Ghostwater Dive'', sharks will circle underneath nearby enemies' feet and a sound will be played, changing based on the amount of health they have left.
** Enemies will hear a disturbing deadly warning tone if their health bar is under the threshold of {{ai|Death from Below|Pyke}}.
* The maximum amount of {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} gained possible from all lethality sources is {{fd|154.5%}}. ''Last Updated: August 3rd, 2020.''
** '''Relevant mathematics:'''
*** {{ii|Youmuu's Wraithblade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|37.5%}}'''|25 × 0.015}} bonus MS
**** {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27%'''|18 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|31.5%}}'''|21 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Sanguine Blade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27%'''|18 × 0.015}} bonus MS while {{sbc|Blood Pursuit}} is active
**** '''+''' {{tt|'''15%'''|10 × 0.015}} bonus MS while inactive
*** {{ii|Umbral Glaive}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''18%'''|12 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Edge of Night}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''15%'''|10 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Serrated Dirk}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''15%'''|10 × 0.015}} bonus MS 
*** {{ri|Sudden Impact}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|10.5%}}'''|7 × 0.015}} bonus MS
**** {{tt|'''Total Increased Percent'''|Excluding Youmuu's Ghostblade and an inactive Sanguine Blade}}: ''{{fd|37.5%}} + {{fd|31.5%}} + 27% + 18% + 15% + 15% + {{fd|10.5%}}'' = '''{{fd|154.5%}}''' bonus MS
***** '''Total Bonus Movement Speed''': {{fd|154.5%}} + 40% = {{fd|194.5%}}

e1.name: Phantom Undertow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the target direction, leaving behind a ''Phantom'' for 1 second.

Afterwards, the ''Phantom'' returns to '''Pyke''', {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies around it and those it passes through along the way for {{fd|1.25}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 10 Lethality)}} seconds. Enemy {{tip|Champion|champions}} also take {{as|physical damage}}.
e1.notes:
* The {{tip|dash}} distance can be extended to up to 900 units (estimated) when targeting across terrain.
* Like most [[missiles|projectiles]], the flying ''Phantom'' cannot hit targets whose {{tip|center range|center}} is behind the position it originates at or beyond the position it catches up to '''Pyke''' at, but the spell ''can'' hit targets behind its origin as long as their {{tip|edge range|hitbox radius}} overlaps with the original unit ''Phantom's'' 110-radius check at the end of its lifespan.
* The maximum increase in {{tip|stun}} duration possible from all lethality sources is {{fd|1.03}} seconds, with the base duration included for a total of {{fd|2.28}} seconds. ''Last Updated: April 11, 2020.''
** '''Relevant mathematics:'''
*** {{ii|Youmuu's Wraithblade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.25}}'''|(25 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
**** {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.18}}'''|(18 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.21}}'''|(21 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Sanguine Blade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.18}}'''|(18 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds while {{sbc|Blood Pursuit}} is active
**** '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.10}}'''|(10 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds while inactive
*** {{ii|Umbral Glaive}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.12}}'''|(12 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Edge of Night}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.10}}'''|(10 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Serrated Dirk}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.10}}'''|(10 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ri|Sudden Impact}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.07}}'''|(7 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
**** {{tt|'''Total Increased Duration'''|Excluding Youmuu's Ghostblade and an inactive Sanguine Blade}}: ''{{fd|0.25}} + {{fd|0.21}} + {{fd|0.18}} + {{fd|0.12}} + {{fd|0.10}} + {{fd|0.10}} + {{fd|0.07}}'' = '''{{fd|1.03}}''' seconds
***** '''Total Stun Duration''': ''{{fd|1.25}} + {{fd|1.03}}'' = '''{{fd|2.28}}''' seconds
